summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation and to North Administrative Center Park; making an appropriation from the Park Acquisition and Development Fund for payment of the second of three annual payments, with interest, on the unpaid balance due under a promissory note and mortgage executed by the City in connection with the purchase of certain property in Section 30, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M., in King County, Washington.
